entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: SW 47 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
